login.title: Log in to your account
login.welcome: Welcome back! Please enter your details.

sign_up.title: Create an account
sign_up.name: Name
sign_up.placeholder_password: At least 8 & max.15 lower case characters

forgot_password.title: Forgot password?
forgot_password.welcome: Enter the email and we’ll send an email with instructions to reset your password

send_email.title: Check your email
send_email.welcome: We have sent a password recover instructions to your email

new_password.title: Create new password
new_password.welcome: Your new password must be different from previous used passwords
new_password.placeholder_password: At least 8 & max.15 lower case characters

feedback.check_email: Please check your email and follow the instructions to activate your account.
feedback.password_recover: We have sent a password recover instructions to your email
feedback.link_expired_desc: Login link has expired, because you haven’t used it
